item.title: Nepal keen to import raw jute from Bangladesh: Nepalese Ambassador
item.description: Nepalese Ambassador to Bangladesh Ghanashyam Bhandari on Thursday has requested the Bangladesh government to focus on the raw jute exports to meet the production needs of Nepal. The Nepalese Ambassador came up with the urge while talking to the Commerce Adviser Sk. Bashir Uddin at the Secretariat.
